Thaumaturgy 5

Burden of Time
Ritual
D5
spell id [id]: 1018
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 29
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 70D
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Burden of Time
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
This evil enchantment will make everyone in the world age at a highly accelerated rate. Unrest will increase in the entire world and soldiers will soon become crippled and useless. While this enchantment is active, the world will become more and more desolate until everyone dies.
Worldwide Population loss about -2%, slightly reduced or increased by growth/death scales, worldwide Unrest +d4, aging for units greatly increased.
